enb_long_title: Twentieth Session of the Subsidiary Bodies to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change
section_title: WORKSHOP ON NON-ANNEX I NATIONAL COMMUNICATIONS
sentences: The workshop on the preparation of national communications from non-Annex I Parties met from 26-30 April 2004, in Manila, the Philippines.

Participants discussed and heard presentations on: national circumstances; national greenhouse gas inventories; measures to facilitate adequate adaptation to climate change; measures to mitigate climate change; constraints and gaps, and related financial, technical and capacity needs; development of project proposals for second national communications; regional/multi- country projects and programmes; multilateral and regional support programmes; bilateral support programmes; and other information.
The Earth Negotiations Bulletin report of the workshop can be found at http://www.iisd.ca/climate/cwman/
